$schema: Plan schema for agent-session checkpoint-based planning (v2)

checkpoints.title: Single Template Screenshot Capture
checkpoints.goal: Create /slidev:sync-template command that captures screenshots for one template - proving the end-to-end workflow with Playwright MCP

files.description: Template folders without screenshots (or old screenshots)

testing_strategy.approach: Manual execution of command on one template

task_groups.title: Create Command Structure
task_groups.objective: Set up the slidev command directory and create the sync-template command file with proper frontmatter

tasks.title: Create slidev commands directory
tasks.description: Create the slidev namespace directory for commands. This establishes the location for all slidev-related workflow commands.

read_before.purpose: Reference existing command structure and frontmatter pattern

actions.command: CREATE .claude/commands/slidev/ directory

tasks.title: Create sync-template.md command file
tasks.description: Create the command file with frontmatter specifying allowed-tools (Read, mcp__playwright__*), description, and arguments. Include placeholder workflow header.

actions.command: CREATE .claude/commands/slidev/sync-template.md with frontmatter: allowed-tools=Read,mcp__playwright__*, description='Capture screenshots for a specific slide template', arguments='--template=<name>'

task_groups.title: Implement Screenshot Workflow
task_groups.objective: Write the workflow prompt that guides agents through reading templates.json, calculating URLs, and using Playwright MCP to capture screenshots

tasks.title: Write workflow introduction and context
tasks.description: Add workflow overview section explaining what the command does, required inputs (--template argument), and high-level steps.

actions.command: UPDATE .claude/commands/slidev/sync-template.md: ADD section '# Sync Template Screenshots' with purpose and required input documentation

tasks.title: Write template lookup logic
tasks.description: Add instructions for reading templates.json, finding the entry matching the --template argument, extracting order and clicks fields, with error handling if template not found.

read_before.purpose: Understand the structure of template entries

actions.command: UPDATE .claude/commands/slidev/sync-template.md: ADD section '## Step 1: Find Template' with instructions to read templates.json, find matching entry, extract order/clicks

tasks.title: Write URL calculation logic
tasks.description: Add instructions for calculating slide URL from order field. Formula: slide_number = parseInt(order) + 1. Base URL pattern with click query parameter.

actions.command: UPDATE .claude/commands/slidev/sync-template.md: ADD section '## Step 2: Calculate URL' with formula slide_number=parseInt(order)+1, base URL https://lascari-ai-learning.github.io/SlidevTemplate/{slide_number}, click pattern ?clicks={n}

tasks.title: Write screenshot capture loop
tasks.description: Add instructions for iterating through click states (0 to clicks value) and capturing screenshots using Playwright MCP tools: browser_navigate and browser_take_screenshot.

actions.command: UPDATE .claude/commands/slidev/sync-template.md: ADD section '## Step 3: Capture Screenshots' with loop for n=0 to clicks, browser_navigate to URL, browser_take_screenshot with filename

tasks.title: Write file save instructions
tasks.description: Add instructions for saving screenshots to slide-templates/{template}/screenshots/click-{n}.png, creating the screenshots directory if needed, and completion summary.

actions.command: UPDATE .claude/commands/slidev/sync-template.md: ADD section '## Step 4: Save Screenshots' with directory path slide-templates/{template}/screenshots/, filename pattern click-{n}.png, mkdir instruction

task_groups.title: Test and Validate
task_groups.objective: Execute the sync-template command on test templates and verify screenshots are captured correctly

tasks.title: Execute sync-template on title template
tasks.description: Run /slidev:sync-template --template=title and observe the workflow execution. Title template has clicks=0, so only click-0.png should be created.

actions.command: RUN /slidev:sync-template --template=title
VERIFY Playwright MCP tools invoked correctly (browser_navigate, browser_take_screenshot)

tasks.title: Verify screenshots created
tasks.description: Confirm the screenshots directory was created and click-0.png exists with correct content showing the title slide.

actions.command: CHECK slide-templates/title/screenshots/ directory exists
VERIFY click-0.png file exists and shows title slide correctly

tasks.title: Test on template with multiple clicks
tasks.description: Run /slidev:sync-template --template=intro-what-well-cover (clicks=3) and verify click-0.png through click-3.png are created showing progressive reveal states.

actions.command: RUN /slidev:sync-template --template=intro-what-well-cover
VERIFY click-0.png, click-1.png, click-2.png, click-3.png exist in slide-templates/intro-what-well-cover/screenshots/
VERIFY each screenshot shows progressive reveal states

checkpoints.title: Sync All Templates Command
checkpoints.goal: Create /slidev:sync-all command that iterates through templates.json and captures all screenshots

testing_strategy.approach: Execute sync-all and verify all template screenshots
verification_steps: Verify screenshots exist for all 9 templates in templates.json
Verify click count matches the clicks field for each template

tasks.description: Add instructions for capturing screenshots for each template using the same pattern as sync-template.

read_before.purpose: Reference the capture workflow to reuse

actions.command: UPDATE .claude/commands/slidev/sync-all.md: ADD section '## Step 2: Iterate and Capture' with for-each loop over slides, URL calculation, screenshot capture for each click state

tasks.title: Write completion summary

actions.command: UPDATE .claude/commands/slidev/sync-all.md: ADD section '## Step 3: Report Summary' with total templates synced, total screenshots captured

task_groups.title: Test and Validate
task_groups.objective: Run sync-all and verify all 9 templates have correct screenshots

tasks.title: Execute sync-all command
tasks.description: Run /slidev:sync-all and observe iteration through all templates.

actions.command: RUN /slidev:sync-all

tasks.title: Verify all templates have screenshots
tasks.description: Confirm all 9 templates have correct number of screenshots matching their clicks field.

read_before.purpose: Reference expected click counts for each template

actions.command: VERIFY all 9 templates have screenshots directory with correct click count: title(0), intro-what-well-cover(3), about-me(0), icon-list-content(2), continuum-diagram(4), extremes-to-middle(2), continuum-middle-ground(3), three-to-one-takeaway(4), conclusion-lets-connect(0)
